Key Match Events: Chimwemwe Idana scored an own goal in the 22nd minute for Burundi
Chawanangwa Kaonga equalized for Malawi in the 31st minute
Jean Claude Girumugisha gave Burundi the lead again two minutes after Kaonga's goal
Lanjesi Nkhoma scored for Malawi in the second half
Mokono Elie Eldhino sealed the win for Burundi in the 87th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Bingu National Stadium
Burundi is currently at the top of Group L
Senegal will host Burkina Faso on Friday
Malawi will face Senegal back-to-back in October
Burundi will host Senegal at BNS
